title: aew
author: aew
content: I have 100$ Bitcoin I need 100$ PayPal f&f or you be able to pay a 100$ invoice to me .Pm if interested

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: aew on July 24, 2022, 11:24:35 PMI have 100$ Bitcoin I need 100$ PayPal f&f or you be able to pay a 100$ invoice to me .Pm if interested You have 100$ in bitcoin? You know the price keeps fluctuating, right? You should specify exact numbers in sats. to be more clear.. (btw dont bother dm'ing me, not interested)
